short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your Chrome tabs to markdown format for research and note-taking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Researcher helps you save and organize your research by exporting your open Chrome tabs into well-formatted markdown files. Perfect for researchers, students, and anyone who wants to keep track of their browser research.

Features:
- Export all open tabs with one click
- Organize tabs by domain
- Generate markdown-formatted files
- Easy integration with note-taking apps
- Clean, simple interface
- No data collection or tracking

Perfect for:
- Research projects
- Article writing
- Study sessions
- Content curation
- Bookmark organization

The exported markdown files can be easily imported into note-taking apps like Obsidian, Notion, or any markdown editor.

Privacy Policy:
This extension does not collect or transmit any personal data. It only requires tabs permission to access your open tabs for export purposes.
